Description:
On the wall of the volcano you find a dwarven forge for auxiliary works of the city. Although it is somewhat damaged, it seems to still work.

On one side of the forge you see some obsidian ingots and some dwarf blueprints that are still intact.

Obsidian ingots are valuable in their own right, but perhaps you could try using them to craft some of the dwarven items shown on the blueprints.
DescriptionAction: What do you want to do?
